item.title: Pvp drops
item.dc:creator: @Ashi Ashi
item.description:
@Ashi wrote:

zyle1992:

The code you have shouldn’t even compile. You have two local variables that are both called “random2”.

You misread it, I though he did too until I saw it properly, its random2 and random[size=12pt]s[/size]2

Read full topic

item.title: Pvp drops
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

The code you have shouldn’t even compile. You have two local variables that are both called “random2”.

Let’s just assume that the code does compile. The problem is with this part here:

int random2 = Misc.random(6);
if (random2 == 10) {
    // ...
}

What this says is “get a random number, between 1 and 6. If that number is 10, process the drop stuff”. Do you see how this could be a problem? The highest “random2” can possibly go is 6, but you don’t process anything unless it’s equal to 10.

Read full topic

item.title: Pvp drops
item.dc:creator: @Ashi Ashi
item.description:
@Ashi wrote:

int random = Misc.random() * 100;

//10%
if (random > 10) {
//your code
}

Should do the job

Read full topic

item.title: Pvp drops

item.description:
@cammyPVPftw wrote:

so i killed my friend about 30 times to test and still nothing. maybe the drop rate is rare, but thats why i am asking you guys, in this code where would i chnage it to increase the drop rate?

[code=java]int random2 = Misc.random(20);
int randomz2 = Misc.random(6);
if(random2 == 10) {
if (randomz2 == 0)
{
Server.itemHandler.createGroundItem(o, 14876, c.getX(), c.getY(), 1, c.killerId);
o.sendMessage("<col=990>Congratulations! you recieved a PvP artifact drop! Talk to the sin seer at home!");
}
if (randomz2 == 1)//demise
{
Server.itemHandler.createGroundItem(o, 14877, c.getX(), c.getY(), 1, c.killerId);
o.sendMessage("<col=990>Congratulations! you recieved a PvP artifact drop! Talk to the sin seer at home!");
}
if (randomz2 == 2)
{

o.sendMessage("<col=990>Congratulations! you recieved a PvP artifact drop! Talk to the sin seer at home!");
}
if (randomz2 == 3)
{
Server.itemHandler.createGroundItem(o, 14879, c.getX(), c.getY(), 1, c.killerId);
o.sendMessage("<col=990>Congratulations! you recieved a PvP artifact drop! Talk to the sin seer at home!");
}
if (randomz2 == 4)
{
Server.itemHandler.createGroundItem(o, 14880, c.getX(), c.getY(), 1, c.killerId);
o.sendMessage("<col=990>Congratulations! you recieved a PvP artifact drop! Talk to the sin seer at home!");
}
if (randomz2 == 5)
{
Server.itemHandler.createGroundItem(o, 14881, c.getX(), c.getY(), 1, c.killerId);
o.sendMessage("<col=990>Congratulations! you recieved a PvP artifact drop! Talk to the sin seer at home!");
}

	}[/code]
